scheduler

Class FairScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • action.Action
      • scheduler.Scheduler
        • scheduler.FairScheduler

  • public class FairScheduler
extends Scheduler
    This class defines a fair scheduler that has a current action once this action is finished the fair scheduler will take care of the first non-finished action that is next to this current action
    Author:
    Alexandre LEFEBVRE - Thomas OSTROWSKI

      Constructors
